title: Making Friends & Keeping Them - Communication & Conflict Resolution
description: A comprehensive lesson plan focusing on communication skills and conflict resolution for middle school students. Includes interactive activities, role-playing scenarios, and reflection worksheets to help students build lasting friendships.
shortDescription: Communication and conflict resolution lesson for grades 5-7

seo.title: Making Friends & Keeping Them - Communication Lesson Plan
seo.description: Interactive lesson plan for teaching communication and conflict resolution skills to middle school students. Includes activities and worksheets.

title: School Counseling 12 Monthly Parent Newsletters - Volume 1
description: A comprehensive set of 12 monthly newsletter templates designed for effective communication with parents. Each newsletter includes age-appropriate topics, tips, and resources for supporting student development at home.
shortDescription: 12 monthly newsletter templates for parent communication

seo.title: School Counseling Monthly Parent Newsletters - Volume 1
seo.description: 12 monthly newsletter templates for school counselors to communicate effectively with parents. Includes tips, resources, and age-appropriate content.

title: Time to Reflect - Horseplay and Fighting Reflection Worksheets
description: Comprehensive reflection worksheets designed for students who have been involved in horseplay or fighting. Perfect for in-school suspension, detention, or restorative justice practices. Helps students process their actions and develop better decision-making skills.
shortDescription: Reflection worksheets for horseplay and fighting incidents

seo.title: Time to Reflect - Horseplay and Fighting Worksheets
seo.description: Reflection worksheets for students involved in horseplay or fighting. Perfect for ISS, detention, or restorative justice practices.

title: Mindful Walking Worksheets - Calming Prompts for Observation
description: A set of calming worksheets designed to guide students through mindful walking exercises. Perfect for stress relief, emotional regulation, and teaching mindfulness techniques. Suitable for grades 3-12.
shortDescription: Mindful walking worksheets with calming prompts for grades 3-12

seo.title: Mindful Walking Worksheets - Calming Prompts for Students
seo.description: Mindful walking worksheets with calming prompts for observation and reflection. Perfect for teaching mindfulness and stress relief to students.

title: School Nurse and School Counselor Student Wellness Collab Poster
description: A collaborative poster activity designed to foster teamwork between school nurses and counselors while promoting student wellness. Students work together to create a beautiful display that highlights the importance of both physical and mental health.
shortDescription: Collaborative poster for school nurse and counselor wellness

seo.title: School Nurse and Counselor Student Wellness Collaboration Poster
seo.description: Collaborative poster activity for school nurses and counselors to promote student wellness and teamwork.
